``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Pisiform @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} - Medial side of base of 5th proximal phalanx @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Dorsal digital expansion of 5th digit @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **5th MCP**: Flexion, Abduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **5th PIP, DIP**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
